name: Light
desc: An element associated with purity, healing, and illumination, often used to counter dark forces.

name: Dark
desc: An element linked to shadows, curses, and dark magic, often used to weaken or corrupt enemies.

name: Fire
desc: An element symbolizing destruction and renewal, capable of causing great damage and burning foes.

name: Water
desc: An element representing fluidity and adaptability, used for healing, support, and drowning enemies.

name: Wind
desc: An element embodying speed and freedom, used to enhance agility, create barriers, and control the air.
